title: Online Pre-Learning Tutorials to Strengthen Basic Science Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of foundational biology, chemistry, and physiology
context.additional_context: Short intensive course providing scientific literacy to language learners, supporting academic integration. Real-time online sessions for reviewing pre-learning content and facilitating advanced discussions

learning_goals: Core concepts in basic sciences (biology, chemistry, physiology) can be explained with over 80% accuracy.
Learners autonomously organize content via online tutorials and achieve over 70 points on quizzes.
Scientific terminology and theories covered in lessons can be applied to language translation and interpretation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
